generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, viewed from the perspective of a vehicle.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a sidewalk adjacent to the road, and there are curbs separating the sidewalk from the road.
- building: There are large buildings with visible facades, windows, and commercial signs (e.g., "Sparkasse").
- pole: There are vertical poles visible, including one near the bicycle and another supporting a traffic light.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: There is some vegetation visible in the bottom-left corner of the image.
- terrain: There is a small patch of terrain (possibly grass or soil) visible in the bottom-left corner of the image.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, although it is partially obscured by the buildings.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: The front of a car (including the Mercedes-Benz logo) is visible at the bottom of the image.
